summary: This bill, the Stop Chinese Communist Prying by Vindicating Intellectual Safeguards in Academia Act of 2025 (Stop CCP VISAs Act of 2025), aims to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act. It prohibits the admission of Chinese nationals as nonimmigrant students (F, J, or M visas) for research or study purposes. The bill's sponsors include several members of the House of Representatives.
